content.prompt: Archaeologists have theorized that Nan Madol was a significant ceremonial center based on its extensive network of basalt structures and

choices.label: evidence of long-distance trade, including caches of jade and gold
the excavation of expansive marble quarries
the remains of large amounts of adornments, food, and kava

topic.text: 9.3: Theories and Interpretations of Pacific Art

skill.text: Skill 7.B: Explain how one or more art historically valid interpretations of a work of art (or group of related works of art) are derived from an analysis of its form, style, materials, content, function, context, reception, and/or meaning.
